Internationally known psychic & trance channel, Rochelle Sparrow, joined the show to talk about her work and the life-changing effects it has had on many of the people she has come in contact with. During the first 30 minutes Rochelle discussed her books and her abilities. Her book JFK is Still Alive is considered controversial as it is a tell all but from the spirit of JFK.
Rochelle gave past life and general readings for our chat room with some of her readings sending chills down their spines. It seemed that many of the listeners that received readings were able to connect with it in profound ways.
During the second hour we had the news and heard from The Professor Slim King who had received a reading from Rochelle during the first hour. Jeremiah also encouraged everyone to send in pictures of themselves for the SITD Family Album that will be posted on the website.

item.itunes:summary:
Anthony Peake joined us to discuss his theory of what exactly happens to human consciousness at the point of death. He calls this theory “Cheating the Ferrymen”.
Anthony touched on numerous topics that have plagued mankind since the beginning of time. What happens at death? What is Deja Vu exactly? He claims that he theory could be the answer to these questions and many others. He shared stories told to him by people who experienced Near Death and confirmed that what he is saying is how it happened. Things like time slowing down, even stopping or seeing your life before your eyes.
Anthony explained how he believed we each lived in our own reality or universe. How we actually are behind in time as to the reality we see. Is reality something else such as an illusion. Anthony believes so!

item.itunes:summary: Kenaz Filan has written practical guides to Haitian Vodou and will be joining us to shed light on a practice that is looked at as very dark. Haitian Vodou, like other folk traditions, is an eminently practical craft. Vodou practitioners see their relationship with the lwa, the spirits honored in Haitian Vodou, as mutually beneficial rather than one-sided. In return for sincere offerings, the lwa are happy to provide protection and support in dealing with life’s problems—which more often than not concern love.

item.itunes:summary: Penny Kelly, Author of the book Robes joined us to share her experience that included 7 little people in brown robes that visited her and shared future visions. item.title: Shadows in the Dark - Episode #138 - 01/22/09 - Steve Sklar
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Steve Sklar is a performer and teacher of khoomei, or Tuvan Throat-Singing. Rather than focus on simpler western overtone singing, he has mastered the traditional Tuvan techniques. He has developed unique methods for teaching throat-singing and the
item.itunes:summary:
Steve Sklar is a performer and teacher of khoomei, or Tuvan Throat-Singing. Rather than focus on simpler western overtone singing, he has mastered the traditional Tuvan techniques. He has developed unique methods for teaching throat-singing and the Tibetan low, chordal chant voice. He has for several years been associated with the Tuvan master ensemble, Huun-Huur-Tu.
The history of Tuvan throat singing reaches very far back. Among the Tuvans, throat singing is taught formally at the Tuvan School Of Art, but it also comes naturally to them and is picked up like a language. Many of the male herders can throat sing, and women are beginning to practice the technique as well. The popularity of throat singing among Tuvans seems to have arisen as a result of geographic location and culture. The open landscape of Tuva allows for the sounds to carry a great distance. Ethnomusicologists studying throat singing in these areas mark khoomei as an integral part in the ancient pastoral animism that is still practiced today.

item.itunes:summary:

A congratulations is also in order for Henry Blackhart is Dead!, a film produced by Charlie that has been nominated for a People’s Choice Award.
During the second hour Charlie broke some news about a UFO sighting that recently took place in Florida. This sighting inlcuded 6 objects that seemed to be translucent and flying in pattern. Jeremiah and Charlie also discussed an upcoming project they will be working on. They will be shooting a documentary on the Green Park Inn in Blowing Rick, NC.

item.itunes:summary:
America’s Historian of the Strange, Robert Schneck, joined us to talk ouija boards, ghost and all things bizarre. Robert has recently been researching ouija murders in which individuals claimed that they were told to murder through one of the most controversial “toys” ever made. Robert shared some of the stories that he has dug up on the ouija board that included; woman in Chicago killing themselves, a 1923 case where a woman said according to the ouija board her son and husband were going to kill her so she shot them. He shared many other stories as well. During the first hour Jeremiah and Robert touched on the lack of creativity in ghost hunting.
During the second hour Robert shared some amazing stories of giant frogs and frogs riding motorcycles and bicycles. These were amazing stories that were simply hard to believe. Robert also discussed and shared tips on writing on the paranormal.

Robert shared some of the stories that he has dug up on the ouija board that included; woman in Chicago killing themselves, a 1923 case where a woman said according to the ouija board her son and husband were going to kill her so she shot them. He shared many other stories as well. During the first hour Jeremiah and Robert touched on the lack of creativity in ghost hunting.

During the second hour Robert shared some amazing stories of giant frogs and frogs riding motorcycles and bicycles. These were amazing stories that were simply hard to believe. Robert also discussed and shared tips on writing on the paranormal.

item.itunes:summary:
JoAnn and her husband, Carl Parks, are the owner and caretakers of the world famous quartz crystal skull, known as MAX. They both live the average everyday life in Houston, Texas, USA.
In 1973, their 12 year old daughter was diagnosed with a rare form of bone cancer, and was given 3 months to live. Through circumstance they met a Tibetan trained healer through their family medical doctor. JoAnn feels through the healers work, the creator, and the crystal skull, Max had helped to extend their daughters life by 3 years, with no explanation from the medical doctors.
JoAnn ended up working for the healer for 4 1/2 years not really knowing why. Before Lama Norbu died, he gave the cherished artifact to JoAnn and her husband telling them “to take care of the skull and one day you will know what it is all about”. JoAnn knew nothing about crystal skulls, so she placed Max in a box in the closet for 10 years. Through JoAnn’s open mind and destiny, Max the crystal skull came out of the closet and into the world. JoAnn and Max have been on a spiritual path for 21 plus years through out the US and Europe, allowing people to experience, interact, and connect to self through this tool.

item.itunes:summary:
First hour welcomed John Perkins. As an Economic Hitman, Johns job was to convince Third World countries to accept enormous loans for infrastructure development (loans that were much larger than needed) and to guarantee that the development projects were contracted to U.S. corporations like Halliburton and Bechtel. Once these countries were saddled with huge debts, the U.S. government and the international aid agencies allied with it were able to control these economies and to ensure that oil and other resources were channeled to serve the interests of building a global empire.
John Houge was our second hour guest. He discussed his latest ebook, “Nostradamus and the Antichrist: Code Named Mabus”. We looked at potential candidates for the antichrist who included: G. W. Bush, Hussein, Obama and others.

Ted shared stories of light balls and unseen forces. Witnessed at the Marley Woods site has been two large white animals. One even witness even shot one of the creatures that seemed to not even phase it. Phillips said it sounded very much like the skinwalkers.
During the second hour Ted told of more Marley Woods stories but also talked about a subterranean artifact in Slovakia.

Clyde Lewis has had an extensive radio career and best known for his show Ground Zero that discusses paranormal and parapolitical topics. He has written a number of investigative articles that appear on his website, www.groundzeromedia.org, and have been published in UFO Magazine and Chris Fleming’s Unknown Magazine.
During the first hour of the show Clyde shared the West Desert Alien story. This is a picture of a shrub that within it has what looks to be a camouflaged alien looking being. Clyde had strange and even life threatening experiences after posting this picture on his website. He was visited by mysterious men saying to take it down and even his car was blown up with him in it.
During the second hour we talked some about throat-singing and the Tracy UFO case. Olav Phillips joined in the discussion on Tracy to give some more detail.

item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator

item.itunes:subtitle: International explorer, archaeologist and author Jonathan Gray returned and gave updates on new discoveries taking place in the archaeology community. Jeremiah started off by sharing his May trip to Chichen Itza and told of the amazing structures that
item.itunes:summary:
International explorer, archaeologist and author Jonathan Gray returned and gave updates on new discoveries taking place in the archaeology community. Jeremiah started off by sharing his May trip to Chichen Itza and told of the amazing structures that were there.
During the first hour Jonathan informed us of the recent discovery of some ancient ruins in New Zealand that appear to be Celtic in origin. The New Zealand Government is tring to suppress the information causing some fear from the public of what exactly their history might be. It is the New Zealand’s Government intentions to keeps this information under wraps until 2063. These lead to a discussion of the similarities of many ancient cultures on a global scale and the possibility of global travel of these cultures. Also discussed in the first hour was a bullet hole found in an Egyptian mummy, how in Chinese history fiction was illegal to write giving their writing credibility of what their culture was like, and Atlantis and what archaeological finds may back up it’s existence.
The 2nd hour started out talking about archeological finds that backed up Biblical stories. Jonathan shared his experience of traveling to Mountains of Arat to shoot down the claims that there was a boat under the snow which was Noah’s Ark. He said that he came to the realization that man made was there, that was over 7,000 feet about sea level and match the demintions of Noah’s Ark. We also discussed the possibility of the flood and evidence that supported it. We then switched the discussion to giants. Skeletal remains have been discovered that show man being up to 15 feet tall with even some reports of find a skeleton that reach 30 feet.

item.itunes:summary:
Phil Harris has authored a number of books, is a spiritual growth expert, has a blog and host his own internet radio show. He is a man who does a lot and can discuss a wide range of topics. Phil took us on a journey through spiritualism, secret societies, conspiracies, dogma, 2012 and what ever else was running through his mind.
During the first hour Phil discussed politics and where we might be headed under President Elect Obama. We discussed our political system and how much sense it does or doesn’t make. Of course this was followed up by talk of secret societies and conspiracies.
During the second hour Phil talked on the subject of 2012. What exactly is coming? Good or bad? How do we prepare? We received a call from our good friend Dr. Gary Frick who weighed in on the topic and also discusses quantum physics.

item.title: Shadows in the Dark - Episode #122 - Benton Hall in Wilkesboro, NC
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcasting from Benton Hall in Wilkesboro, NC where paranormal activity has been reported since the remodeling of the building, the show started with interviews from witnesses that have worked in the building as well as those who were part of the ghost
item.itunes:summary:
Broadcasting from Benton Hall in Wilkesboro, NC where paranormal activity has been reported since the remodeling of the building, the show started with interviews from witnesses that have worked in the building as well as those who were part of the ghost tour being given over the past week. During the first part of the week the tours were quite but as the week came to a close, activity seemed to pick up. First was Eric who told of how, while doing an energy circle in the Green Room (actor waiting room), the room seemed to get cold and they heard what sounded like a marble drop but never could find the cause. Next was the Executive Director of The Wilkes Playmakers, Karen Reynolds. Karen talked about the tour they were giving over the past week and told of some of the experiences tour participants have had at Benton Hall. She also told of a past experience where she heard children entering the building and walking across the wood floors which they were expecting. Upon going out to meet them she found no one present. Mixed in with the interviews and music, Toppie from TopCast called in to share a joke and just have a little fun. Third up from the Wilkes Playmakers was Jacob. Jacob told of where on the previous night they had an experience in the Green Room were they laid a lighter in the middle of everyone and blew out the candles. When going to relight the candles, the lighter was gone and found underneath a couch near by.
During the second hour, we continued playing some more music which included Shadows in the Dark’s original “The Paranormal Song.” Our good friend Robert Schneck called in to wish everyone a Happy Halloween. Mike Prindiville joined us to tell us what was going with the investigation that was going on at Benton Hall. He told us about some EMF spikes and possible pictures that may produce something. Kim called in to tell us about living in a haunted apartment that her Grandmother passed away in. Her son keep talking about an old lady that came out of his closet. This was a very interesting and spine tingling story.

item.title: Shadows in the Dark - Episode #120 - 10/23/08 - Duncan Lunan
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Could it be possible that we succeeded in two way communication with life outside our planet and no one noticed? Did they hear our message and respond but we just didn’t understand? This could very well be the case as early as 1928 in Eindhoven
item.itunes:summary:
Could it be possible that we succeeded in two way communication with life outside our planet and no one noticed? Did they hear our message and respond but we just didn’t understand? This could very well be the case as early as 1928 in Eindhoven Holland and again in 1929 aboard a French research vessel in the South China Sea. After transmitting over the radio waves 3 sounds in rapid succession every 30 seconds, Van der Pol in Eindhoven examined the return echoes. They were not as neatly spaced as he had sent them. They were highly irregular, ranging from 1 to 30 seconds in delay time. The discrepancies were explained as fluctuations in the ionosphere, or magnetic disturbances, but the pitch or frequency of the sounds did not change – only the spacing of the echoes.
The mystery stood as that until the 1970’s when it was carefully examined and deciphered by Duncan Lunan, a scientist from Scotland. He plotted a vertical axis of the transmitted pulse sequence with a horizontal axis of echo delay time which resulted in a picture of the constellation Boï¿½tis as it would look 15,000 years ago.
Duncan also told us about the “green children”, an account of two children, boy and girl, who seemed to appear out of nowhere in the 12th century. He explained how there was plenty of documentation that backed this story up and he had even traced the lineage of the girl up to the present day. When asked where they were from, the children described a planet that was obviously not our own.

item.itunes:subtitle: Gladio (Italian, from Latin gladius, meaning sword) is a code name denoting the clandestine NATO “stay-behind” operation in Italy after World War II, intended to counter an eventual Warsaw Pact invasion of Western Europe. Although Gladio
item.itunes:summary:
Gladio (Italian, from Latin gladius, meaning sword) is a code name denoting the clandestine NATO “stay-behind” operation in Italy after World War II, intended to counter an eventual Warsaw Pact invasion of Western Europe. Although Gladio specifically refers to the Italian branch of the NATO stay-behind organizations, “Operation Gladio” is used as an informal name for all stay-behind organizations.
The role of the CIA in sponsoring Gladio and the extent of its activities during the Cold War era, and its relationship to attacks perpetrated in Italy during the years of lead and other similar clandestine operations is the subject of ongoing debate and investigation.
Olav Phillips, our Conspiracy Researcher, discussed some on the doings of Gladio and helped to see where their fingerprints are today. He explained how even in the case of 9/11, the Gladio Operation could be seen. Olav stated, “This is something that makes you doubt everything.” Unlike most other conspiracies, Gladio has been exposed in Italy and there is documents to back up it’s existence.

item.itunes:summary:
When nine atmospheric crafts of unknown origin were discovered in the Antarctic in the late 1940s, the U.S. government established Area 51 to study the abandoned technology. Dr. Hans Von Seeckt, who is the only original member of the secret research committee, has observed the marvelous craft in flight and witnessed a fantastic array of bizarre, unexplained phenomena. But Dr. Van Seeckt fears that the technology of the mothership is beyond our scope and an explosive threat to the entire planet. He must race against time to unlock the secret of the ship – and to the origins of mankind itself.
During the first hour Author of the Area 51 series, Robert Doherty (AKA – Bob Mayer) joined us. He discussed some of he inspirations for the series and the research that went behind it.
During the second hour Author of The President’s Vampire, Robert Schneck, joined us to tell about his recent trip to Salem and the site he saw and recommends.

item.title: Shadows in the Dark - Episode #114 - Lon Milo DuQuette
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. John Dee (1527-1608) was one of the greatest minds of the Elizabethan Age, and his system of angelic communication was the result of the most dramatic magical operation ever recorded. It has survived to become the cornerstone of the modern ceremonial
item.itunes:summary:
Dr. John Dee (1527-1608) was one of the greatest minds of the Elizabethan Age, and his system of angelic communication was the result of the most dramatic magical operation ever recorded. It has survived to become the cornerstone of the modern ceremonial magician’s practice.
In 1582 Dee and his clairvoyant partner Edward Kelley made magical contact with a number of spiritual entities who identified themselves as angels – the same that communicated with Adam, Enoch, and the patriarchs of the Old Testament. Over the next three years they revealed to Dee and Kelley three distinct magical systems of vision magick. The third and last of these incorporated a series of “calls” to be recited in an angelic language in order to raise the consciousness of the magician to a level where angelic contact is possible.
Best-selling author and magician, Lon Milo DuQuette, who has practiced Dee’s system for over twenty-five years, has seized upon elements of the original Dee material overlooked by adepts of the Golden Dawn, Aleister Crowley, and other modern magicians, and brought them to light in Enochian Vision Magick. DuQuette offers the expert and novice alike the practical means by which they can become attuned in the same simple step-by-step manner that first prepared Dee and Kelley.
